name: Studio 100: The Play Island
overview: The Studio 100: Play Island (or Het Studio 100 Speeleiland) is a collection of games based around popular characters such as Studio 100's K3, Kells, Maja the bee and Amika. The game can be played by everyone together in the same style as the immensely popular WiiSports. Whether played by children, children with one parent, or with your grandmother, everyone has fun. In short, a true party game!
